results.question: Seoul is the capital of North Korea.
Greenland is almost as big as Africa.
A group of islands is called an 'archipelago'.
Greenland is covered with grass and Iceland covered with ice.

Vatican City is a country.

The Southeast Asian island of Borneo is politically divided among 3 countries.

Ottawa is the capital of Canada.
There exists an island named "Java".
